text: Saha shεli Annabi Issa ni daa ti kpahim baŋ bɛ (Yahuudunim’) chεfuritali, ka o yεli: “Banima n-leei yɛn sɔŋ ma n-zaŋ labi Naawuni sani?” Hawariyunanim ban yεli: “Tinima n- nyɛ Naawuni sɔŋdiba, achiika! Tinim’ ti Naawuni yεlimaŋli, dinzuɣu dim shɛhira kadama tinim’ zaŋ ti maŋ’ zaasa n-ti Naawuni.”
